Module FYPManager
Package controllers

Interface ICoordRequestManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
CoordRequestManager
public interface ICoordRequestManager
This interface is used to manage the requests made by coordinators.

    • getPendingRequestbyID

      Request getPendingRequestbyID(Faculty user, int id)
      This method is to view a pending request by its ID.
      Parameters:
      user - The user who is viewing the request.
      id - The ID of the request to be viewed.
      Returns:
      The request with the given ID.

    • getPendingReqs

      ArrayList<Request> getPendingReqs(Faculty user)
      This method is to get the pending requests of a faculty.
      Parameters:
      user - The faculty whose requests are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The list of pending requests of the faculty.
